mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_video_info (id, camera_number, video_name, video_time, floor_number, room_number, video_site, video_adapter_relation, is_alarm, alarm_time, update_time, remark, video_number) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cameraNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{floorNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roomNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{videoSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoAdapterRelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isAlarm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_video_info set camera_number = #{cameraNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_name = #{videoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_time = #{videoTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, floor_number = #{floorNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, room_number = #{roomNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, video_site = #{videoSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_adapter_relation = #{videoAdapterRelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_alarm = #{isAlarm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm_time = #{alarmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_number = #{videoNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, camera_number, video_name, video_time, floor_number, room_number, video_site, video_adapter_relation, is_alarm, alarm_time, update_time, remark, video_number from t_video_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, camera_number, video_name, video_time, floor_number, room_number, video_site, video_adapter_relation, is_alarm, alarm_time, update_time, remark, video_number from t_video_info
